oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Jerry Douglas - 2008-08-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jerry Douglas and others in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame on August 27, 2008. Band includes Luke Bulla; Bryan Sutton; Bela Fleck; Sam Bush; Edgar Meyer; John Douglas; The Whites;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jerry Douglas;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performance includes; Another Morning (with Bela Fleck); Bounce (with Sam Bush and Edgar Meyer); Spanish Point (with Bryan Sutton and Luke Bulla); Green Slime; When You're Lonely (with John Douglas); This Morning At Nine (with John Douglas); Who's Your Uncle?; The Lochs Of Dread; The Lights Of Home; White House Blues (with Sam Bush); Intermission; Hanging Around (with the Whites); You Put The Blue In Me (with the Whites); If It Ain't Love (Let's Leave It Alone) (with the Whites); Give Me Back That Old Familiar Feeling (with the Whites); Lonesome Wind (with the Whites); Making Believe (with the Whites); Fancy Dance (with the Whites); Tumbling Tumbleweeds (with the Whites); Abilene Gal (with the Whites); Swing Down Sweet Chariot (with the Whites);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Douglas, Jerry, 1956-; Bush, Sam; Bulla, Luke; Sutton, Bryan; Fleck, Bela; Meyer, Edgar; Douglas, John; the Whites (Musical group); Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
